articles.title: Novak Djokovic Says Alexander Zverev Punishment "Correct", Andy Murray Blasts "Reckless" German - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Zverev went on a tirade over a disputed call during his doubles opener alongside Marcelo Melo, verbally abusing the official and repeatedly hitting the umpire's chair with his racquet at the end of the match.
articles.content: Novak Djokovic has deemed the tour's decision to disqualify Alexander Zverev from the Acapulco tournament as "correct" while Andy Murray described the German's racquet-smashing spree as "dangerous" a… [+4240 chars]
